content: thank you for downloading my pattern this pattern is intended for personal use only rewriting reselling distributing or copying this pattern isn t allowed you may sell the finished product created from this pattern please mention the crafty gobbo as the designer of the pattern if you have any questions about this pattern feel free to contact me at the crafty gobbo@gmail com the crafty gobbo @the crafty gobbo dijanka23 copyright 2022 the crafty gobbo all rights reserved pattern notes the finished size is approximately 5 cm 2 inches this pattern is not worked in a spiral each round is finished with a slip_stitch into the first stitch of the round chain 1 at the beginning of a round never counts as a stitch i use the magic_ring technique when working in rounds see a tutorial on doing it here you can also use the chain circle instead chain 3 slip_stitch into the first chain and make the single crochets inside the ring alternate the two colors at the beginning of each round after finishing a round with color a add color b by pulling it through the loop on the hook now color b is on the hook pull both yarns tight and leave color a inside begin to work the new round with color b switch back to color a at the beginning of the next round materials yarn sport or fine weight cotton yarn in two colors i used hobbii rainbow cotton 8/4 crochet hook 2 5 - 3 5 mm polyester fiberfill scissors yarn needle abbreviations this pattern is written using us crochet terms ch1 chain 1 never counts as a stitch single_crochet single_crochet stitch slip_stitch slip_stitch increase increase 2 single_crochet into the same stitch decrease decrease 2 single_crochet together … repeat instructions between the parentheses x6 repeat instructions six times … number of stitches at the end of each round copyright 2022 the crafty gobbo all rights reserved instructions round 1 6 single_crochet into a magic_ring slip_stitch into 1st st 6 round 2 ch1 6 increase slip_stitch into 1st st 12 round 3 ch1 12 single_crochet slip_stitch into 1st st 12 round 4 ch1 1 single_crochet 1 increase x6 slip_stitch into 1st st 18 round 5 ch1 18 single_crochet slip_stitch into 1st st 18 round 6 ch1 2 single_crochet 1 increase x6 slip_stitch into 1st st 24 round 7 12 ch1 24 single_crochet slip_stitch into 1st st 24 round 13 ch1 2 single_crochet 1 decrease x6 slip_stitch into 1st st 18 ch1 1 single_crochet 1 decrease x6 slip_stitch into 1st st round 14 12 stuff the egg with fiberfill round 15 ch1 6 decrease slip_stitch into 1st st 6 fasten_off sew the hole shut and hide the remaining tail inside the egg i hope you enjoyed the pattern -
